paramAttribute.name: coinValue
paramAttribute.description: One or more coin values delimited by comma (e.g. '0.02,0.05,0.10,1.00,10.00')

paramAttribute.name: level
paramAttribute.description: Return to player (RTP) can only be one of: '1' (RTP=92%), '2'(RTP=94%), or '3' (RTP=95%)

paramAttribute.name: minBet
paramAttribute.description: Minimum Bet in dollars and cents.

paramAttribute.name: maxBet
paramAttribute.description: Maximum Bet in dollars and cents.
